column1: Uchi////The anticipation and wait was all worth it! Uchi is hands down
column3: the best and hottest sushi restaurant in town. I can honestly say I like everything about this place. From the complimentary valet service
column4: to the modern yet down to earth vibe of the building
column5: all the way down to the superb customer service
column6: this place simply blows me away. (And we haven't even started talking about the food yet.)
